#summary Simple Instructions to install Simpl onto a web server.
#labels Phase-Deploy,Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

  # Download the newest version of Simpl from this site.
  # Copy the "simpl" directory to your web root (ex. /usr/local/www/). _It is not required to install in a web viewable directory_
  # Define some basic directories for Simpl (see Code 1.0 below)
  # Include the Simpl class (see Code 1.1 below)
  # Load the needed classes (see Code 1.2 below)
  # Connect to the database  (see Code 1.3 below)
  # Include your application level classes and you are good to go

= Code Examples =

== Code 1.0 ==
{{{
// Directories
// Always Include trailing slash "/" in Direcories
define('DIR_ABS', '/usr/local/www/');
define('FS_SIMPL', DIR_ABS . 'simpl/');
define('FS_CACHE', DIR_ABS . 'mysite/cache/');

// Database Connection Options
define('DB_USER', '');
define('DB_HOST', '');
define('DB_PASS', '');
define('DB_DEFAULT', '');
}}}

== Code 1.1 ==
{{{
// Simpl Framework
include_once(FS_SIMPL . 'simpl.php');
}}}

== Code 1.2 ==
{{{
// Load the Simpl classes
$mySimpl->Load('Form');
$mySimpl->Load('Db');
$mySimpl->Load('DbTemplate');
}}}

== Code 1.3 ==
{{{
// Make the DB Connection
$db = new DB;
if (!$db->Connect())
	define('DB_STATUS',false);
}}}
